title: At Least 140 Villagers Killed by Suspected Herders in Nigeria
description: The latest case this year of such mass killings blamed on the farmer-herder crisis in the West African nation.

title: 6-Year-Old Boy Traveling to Visit Grandma for Christmas Put on Wrong Spirit Flight
description: A 6-year-old boy who flew for the Christmas holiday to visit his grandmother in southwest Florida was put on the wrong Spirit plane.

title: Biden Orders Strikes on Iranian-Aligned Group After U.S. Troops Injured in Drone Attack in Iraq
description: President Joe Biden ordered airstrikes against Iranian-backed militia groups after three U.S. service members were injured in a drone attack in northern Iraq.

title: Israeli Forces Bombard Central Gaza in Apparent Move Toward Expanding Ground Offensive
description: In apparent preparation to expand their ground offensive into a third section of the besieged territory.

title: 13 Ways the World Got Better in 2023
description: The past year saw multiple wars, increasing climate-change disasters, and public-health challenges. But here are some ways things improved.

title: Learning to Want Again
description: In a personal essay, Rainesford Stauffer reflects on how her sense of wanting has shape-shifted over time.

title: Why Are So Many Notable Celebrity Couples Breaking Up?
description: In 2023, we learned that some of the most famous long-term couples like had called it quits.

title: Why Lauren Boebert’s House Race May Be the Most Closely-Watched of 2024
description: Even before the Beetlejuice scandal, the race was already drawing strong national interest.

title: What Topped Asia’s Legal Agenda in 2023—From Same-Sex Marriage to the Death Penalty
description: Several countries in the region turned their focus this year to drug legalization, death penalty reform, and LGBT inclusivity. Here’s what to know.
